name: Candy Catastrophe
description:
Controls for local:
Jelly uses A+D for movement, space for jump, and Q for mold change
Pepper uses left and right arrows for movement, and up arrow for jump

Candy catastrophe is a 2D co-op puzzle platformer where you control different candies! Jelly is a light and versatile moldable character with a variety of attributes. Pepper is super heavy and fast with the ability to smash and break objects. Together they make up for each other's weaknesses and make it through any challenge!

This game was a submission for the 2022 Back to School Jam.

Three of us worked hard on this project for nearly 48 hours straight
Coleton Wheeler - Programmer
Ava Frittz - Artist and Animator (https://cometcreations.itch.io/)
Shane Thomas - Level Designer 

Sound assets were downloaded from Zapsplat.com
